programme.title: Getting Even with Dad
programme.desc: When the ex-con Ray teams up with two of his buddies to plan a coin heist, things take an unexpected turn when his son Timmy steals the coins in an attempt to get his father's attention and teach him a valuable lesson along the way.(n)

programme.title: Robin: Watch for Wishes
programme.desc: A man decides to do the impossible for his son Robin when he finds out his incurable disease, as he escapes with him from the hospital and decides to go on an adventure to fulfill all his wishes before the police catch them.(n)

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: Larry is newly recruited as a night security guard at the Museum of Natural History, he discovers that an ancient curse brings all the creatures at the museum to life by night.(n)

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: Pat Solitano, a hothead with bipolar disorder, is fresh out of a mental institution and has to move back home with his parents. His plans for getting his life back on track get derailed when he meets the equally eccentric and neurotic Tiffany.(n)

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason and Olivia are a divorced couple trying to raise their young son, Mason Jr. The film follows the boy's life for twelve years, from first grade at age 6, till the twelfth grade, examining his relationship with his parents all the way through.(n)

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: In 1964, racism continues to cast a shadow over America. Three civil rights defenders disappear in Mississippi. Two FBI agents go to the town to look into this mysterious case. Robert Anderson, worked in the region before joining the FBI, is well aware of the nature of the place, so he does not mind bending rules to achieve his goal. Events escalate and attacks on black citizens begin.(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Widowed bookkeeper Loretta finds herself in a love triangle when she accepts her unimpressive boyfriend's proposal, only to start to fall for his brother Ronny. The bad blood between the two brothers can only make the situation worse.(n)

programme.desc: As Kevin burgles businessman Max's house, the robbed becomes the robber as Max steals Kevin's lucky ring, urging him to try to get it back to save his career.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.(n)

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: A paraplegic ex-marine, Jake Sully, is recruited to operate an "Avatar," a human mind in an alien body, with the highly advanced technology of a corporation seeking to plunder the resources of the planet Pandora.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team race against time after a mission gone wrong.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: New York City business student Brian Flanagan gets a part-time job as a bartender to support himself. He ends up in Jamaica where he plans to have his own bar, while he falls for the waitress Jordan.(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: A group of African Americans are opening their own private airline as a very lucrative venture from their point of view, but they have a lot of funny paradoxes, and undesirable things when they add some extra passengers on their first Flight.(n)

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.

programme.title: Echo in the Canyon

programme.title: Echo in the Canyon
programme.desc: A documentary that sheds light on the musical groups like The Beach Boys and The Mamas & the Papas, that paved the way for the iconic Laurel Canyon music scene in LA.

programme.title: Love at the Shore
programme.desc: In an attempt to finish her new novel, single mom Jenna decides to seize the chance of their beach vacation to meet her deadline. But fate has a way of interfering with even the best-laid plans, as Jenna comes to find out when her neighbor, the surfer Lucas, proves a detriment to her progress.

programme.title: Frankie
programme.desc: After knowing that she has only a few months to live, the French actress Frankie undergoes a journey with her family in Sintra, Portugal. Despite the breathtaking views and the beautiful landscape, many struggles find their way among the family members.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Dora who spent her life exploring jungles with her parents,is facing a new challenge--high school. Along with a group of teens and Boots the monkey,she embarks on an adventure to rescue her parents while trying to unlock the mystery of a lost Incan civilization.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: The famous physician John Dolittle has the ability to talk to animals, which gives him tremendous potential, as he embarks on an unforgettable journey with his beloved animals.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: The story follows two New Orleans paramedics whose lives spiral out of control after a designer drug with strange effects causes a series of horrific deaths.

programme.title: The Titan
programme.desc: With Earth slowly becoming inhabitable, humanity has started looking to space for a new place to live. An experiment is launched to manage human evolution in a way that adapts to a new life in space, but tampering with evolution comes at a steep price.

programme.title: Haunt
programme.desc: On Halloween, a group of friends meet at a haunted house that feeds on their darkest fears, their night turns deadly when their lives are all at stake.

programme.title: Love and Sunshine
programme.desc: Finding solace for her broken heart in fostering a military dog called Sunshine, Sunshine's presence brings Ally more joy than she bargained for when the dog's military partner returns to claim him, and sparks start to fly between him and Ally.

programme.title: In the Key of Love

programme.title: Home by Spring
programme.desc: When an impressive opportunity presents itself, Loretta grasps it by both hands, even though it has her pose as her boss. Tasked with setting up the perfect spring retreat in her hometown, she enlists the help of a few familiar faces to pull it off. But her return awakens old feelings long buried.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
programme.desc: When a vengeful rival from his past makes a sudden return, Captain Jack Sparrow must figure out a way to escape the deadly ghosts unleashed by Captain Salazar. His only hope lies in locating the Trident of Poseidon in a journey filled with danger and strife.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. programme.desc: The journey of a father and daughter, through a society that is dying after an epidemic has killed half the world's population, especially women, and through a series of events that test the human personality, the father seeks to protect his daughter and maintain their friendship.(n)

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: A group of people wakes up in a remote area, not remembering when or how they ended up at this place, but they don't know they were carefully chosen for The Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Deadwood: The Movie
programme.desc: As the townspeople gather to celebrate South Dakota's statehood, a clash over land leaves Charlie Utter dead and US Marshall Seth Bullock tries to solve the murder and protect the townspeople from Senator George Hearst.(n)

programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.(n)

programme.desc: A comedy about Phil who finds himself loved by the artificial intelligence programmed in his Jixi cell phone, and his social life becomes completely ruined.(n)

programme.desc: When a SWAT member loses his memory in Vietnam, he struggles to figure out who he is and why he is being pursued. As he starts to remember a kidnapping, he has to team up with a former military operative as they try to find their respective daughter and wife.(n)

programme.title: Love, Take Two
programme.desc: Lily, a television producer, is in for a surprise when her new reality show takes her to her college town. Tasked with filming three couples plan their wedding, life throws her a curveball when she discovers that one of the grooms is her ex-boyfriend, and that their chemistry is just as lit as ever.(n)

programme.title: Love in the Forecast
programme.desc: The life of the weather girl Leah Waddell takes a surprising turn after she decides to make a one year to focus on her career and stop dating. But she finds herself chased by men who want to date her.(n)

programme.desc: When the 12-year old Evan is kicked out of the Mighty Ducks, a major hockey team, he sets out to prove himself by forming a new team with the help of his mother and a former coach down on his luck.(n)

programme.title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. S7
programme.desc: As they go on the Chronicoms' tail, the team finds themselves whisked through several time periods, forcing them to make hard choices to ensure the future stays intact.(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.desc: The story of LGBTQ trailblazer Anne Lister who returns to West Yorkshire in 1832 to restore her late uncle's estate and records her relationship with another woman in a cryptic diary.(n)

programme.title: Killer Under the Bed
programme.desc: After her father dies, Kilee moves with her mother and sister to a new city, as she struggles to adapt to her new life. Things take a turn when Kilee finds a doll riddled with pins in her backyard that she believes holds supernatural powers.

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: Vianne Rocher (Juliette Binoche) moves with her daughter to the countryside of France, where she opens a chocolate shop. The village women begin to buy her products, which angers the mayor . Meanwhile, a Gypsy band comes to the village , including Roux (Johnny Depp), who falls in love with her.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: The true story of how down-on-her-luck single mother Erin Brokovish put together one of the biggest class actions suits in US history and won the high profile case against a multi-million dollar company despite her lack of formal education in the law.

programme.title: Anything for Love
programme.desc: While setting up their online dating profiles, Kate and Jack's friends encourage them to lie. But when the two are matched, their lies threaten to destroy the connection that they have made.

programme.title: The Convenient Groom
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé leaves her, she finds herself in a dilemma since their publicized marriage is about to happen, and the issue could threaten her image as a relationship expert. A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: The true story of how down-on-her-luck single mother Erin Brokovish put together one of the biggest class actions suits in US history and won the high profile case against a multi-million dollar company despite her lack of formal education in the law.

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.

programme.title: I Still Believe
programme.desc: Inspired by real events, the film tells the story of Christian singer Jeremy Camp, shedding light on his crisis of faith in the aftermath of a personal tragedy and how he found his way back, using his music to heal himself and inspire others.

programme.title: The Perfect Catch
programme.desc: A struggling single mother fights to keep her small-town diner afloat. Brought down by a series of disappointments and abandonments, she finds a sliver of hope in the form of an old boyfriend, Chase, who is a professional baseball player who comes to his childhood home after a career disappointment.

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: Science teacher Elliot Moore notices the sudden disappearance of bees, and research scientists are unable to pinpoint the reason for this. Eventually, a horrible plague threatens Earth, causing bizarre behavior among the citizens at Central Park.

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: U.S. Marshall Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a convicted murderer from a hospital for the criminally insane that is located on isolated Shutter Island.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A young couple finds themselves trapped in an isolated motel, where they find a hidden video camera in their room, and then realize that they must escape or they'll be the next victims in a murder film.

programme.title: The French Lieutenant's Woman
programme.desc: An intricate portrait of two parallel love stories; the first is set in the Victorian era, where a gentleman risks everything as he embarks on an affair with a social outcast; while in the second sparks fly between the actors playing those two roles on a film set.

programme.title: Stalked by My Mother
programme.desc: When her boyfriend is killed, Maddy is accused of being the culprit, but she points the finger at her own mother instead. Little do they both know that the boyfriend was never the target, and that real culprit is closer than they think.(n)

programme.title: Benny & Joon
programme.desc: Benny has been taking care of his mentally-ill sister Joon for years. But just as he realizes that he has exhausted his options, he finds an unlikely source of help in the eccentric Sam, who deals with the world by performing the routines of comedic figures like Charlie Chaplin and Buster Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Wendy
programme.desc: As Wendy ends up on a mysterious island where children can not grow old, the joy that hangs around the ever-youthful children begins to sour when an accident turns Wendy's brother resentful, threatening to change the very nature of the island and the everlasting youth it grants.(n)

programme.title: Grace Of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.(n)

programme.title: Mystic pizza
programme.desc: Jojo, Daisy and Kat are three teenage girls, who just graduated from high school and working at a pizza parlor. Each with a different ambition, trying to reach their goals. In that summer before college, they learn more about life, love, goals and about themselves.(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A group of young adults discover a camping area by Crystal Lake, known to be a spot where tragedies have taken place before. Unfortunately, they run into the vengeful Jason Voorhees, who will stop at nothing to end their lives.(n)

programme.title: Vampire's Kiss
programme.desc: After being bitten by a woman, the life of a publishing executive starts to get out of control when he becomes convinced that he is turning into a vampire, leading to a string of erratic actions as he struggles to tell the difference between reality and delusions.(n)

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Whitney returns to Boston to start a new chapter in her life. She has a promising career and a handsome love interest, but she is caught up in a lot of family drama that turns her life upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Other Wife
programme.desc: Kate's life falls apart when she learns that her husband has been leading a double life. Things get even worse when a mysterious killer goes after her for the money her late husband has stolen from him.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Assistant
programme.desc: Amanda is left reeling from the sudden death of her sister Lauren. When she grows to suspect foul play in her death, she is shocked when evidence points to Lauren's own son, Charlie, sending Amanda on a journey to search for the truth about her sister's family.(n)

programme.title: Dead Over Diamonds: Picture Perfect Mysteries
programme.desc: When a diamond necklace is stolen, Det. Sam enlists the help of the photographer Allie to find it. The last thing they expect during their investigation is for it to point them straight to an unexpected death.(n)

programme.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
programme.desc: When Bee a 15 year-old's mother disappears,she sets out to find where she is, while discovering her troubled past in the process.(n)

programme.title: Pacific Heights
programme.desc: A couple's life spirals out of control when they rent an apartment in their San Francisco house to a mysterious man, who has twisted plans in mind.(n)

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Alfie is an English ladies' man who uses his job as a New York City limousine driver to meet attractive women, but his reckless approach to life gets him into many troubles.(n)

programme.title: Come Find Me
programme.desc: David's idyllic relationship with Claire is shattered after she mysteriously disappears. As David starts looking for her, he comes to realize that she was living a double life and he has to risk everything to find her.(n)

When his little sister Sophie joins him, he tries to avoid her, till she gets kidnapped by a giant bear and it's up to him to rescue her.

programme.title: Mamma Mu och Kråkan
programme.desc: Mama Moo is an ordinary cow living a typical life, but she dreams to go on an adventure. When she meets Crow, she tries to get close to him, but he doesn't reciprocate the feeling.

programme.title: Cop Dog/ Marlowe
programme.desc: When a cop is killed, his young son tries to uncover the mystery of his murder with the aid of his dog, as a band of thieves goes after the family as revenge against the father.

programme.title: Black Sheep Smile
programme.desc: As Grumbo shoulders the responsibility of putting a weird theory to practice, Fancy, Chloe, and Victoria resent those attempts. Grambo pulls out all the stops to prove correct.

programme.title: Emilie jolie
programme.desc: Emilie Jolie is afraid of her first day at school. Her mother gives her a book she was reading as a child. Emily enters a magical world through the book, where she has many adventures, and learns to face her fears so she can save the little blue rabbit from the clutches of the evil witch.

programme.title: Bears and Lola
programme.desc: When two boxes accidentally switch in a car accident, Logger Vick finds out the mystery of the box, causing things get out of control in the woods.

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Three siblings find themselves alone on the island of Spitsbergen, where they must join hands to survive a severe snowstorm on one hand and predator bears on the other.

programme.title: Back to the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin is a young adventurous flying fish living in New York harbour. One day, on one of his quests, he got captured by a fishing ship and placed in a fish tank of a famous Chinatown restaurant to soon become food. When a young boy decides never to hurt or eat fish again, he strives to take Kevin back to sea where he could go with his family to Barbados, the mythical kingdom of the flying fish.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: A faraway diner becomes the battleground for the survival of the human race, where a legion of angels arrives to end the world, and the hope of mankind lies in a group of strangersrs trapped in the diner with Archangel Michael (Paul Bettany).

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experiments, the conceited genius scientist Sebastian Caine (Kevin Bacon) discovers a way to make things invisible. He tries the experiment on himself, but discovers that the process cannot be reversed. Things get complicated when he develops devastating side effects to his new condition.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: A reporter and her cameraman accompany the fire department as they investigate screams coming out of an apartment building. As it becomes clear that a mysterious virus that turns people into killers has spread in the building, the CDC quarantines the building, leaving them all stranded inside.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: Suspect Zero
programme.desc: After making a mistake during an investigation, CIA agent Thomas Mackelway (Aaron Eckhart) is moved to a remote area where a series of mysterious killings take place, which he believes are linked together.

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: A look into the backstory of Logan, focusing on his relationship with his brother Victor, the duo's recruitment by William Stryker, and Logan's departure from the mutant mercenary squad. As he tries to live a normal life with his girlfriend, Logan's past comes calling and puts his life on the line.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: After (Spider-Man) gets the key to the city for saving the mayor's life and the city as a whole, he becomes vain and his relationship with (Mary Jane) is strained. He then encounters a parasitic creature from outer space who has the ability to create an evil aggressive spirit.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When Josh Lambert is possessed by an evil spirit, his family strives to save him, as they discover mysterious childhood secrets that draws them back to the spirit world.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: INTERPOL officer Louis and his assistant Elinor discover that the leaders of the largest banks of the year have corrupted their branches in many countries, involving them in arms smuggling, money laundering and destabilizing governments in order to make as much money as possible, forcing them to travel for many countries in order to gather evidence to convict the leaders of that bank.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A couple who are planning to get a divorce, find themselves in a middle of severe storms and need to insert an advanced measuring device in the heart of violent tornados.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A rogue police officer goes on a killing spree by eliminating all versions of himself in a parallel universe to become immortal, and only the last version of himself is left to stop him.

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: When she takes on the case of a priest accused of negligent homicide during an exorcism, a lawyer starts to experience weird happenings related to her case, only for her client to warn her that the demon that he failed to exorcise might have set its eyes on her.(n)

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Years after his wife is killed by the criminal organization he worked for, Machete is hired to kill a senator. During the job, he finds another sniper wanting to kill him, he then embarks on a deadly mission to find those who want him dead and retaliate against the organization that betrayed him.(n)

programme.desc: Isabel is a bored witch who disavows her magical powers and looks for a normal wife. When she meets an actor, Jack, who casts her as a witch in the remake of the famous comedy, Bewitched, everything turns upside down when her fame unexpectedly exceeds his.

programme.title: Closer
programme.desc: The intertwined romance between four people. Dan who's working on his novel and is in a relationship with Alice then meets the photographer Anna and wants to have an affair with her, while Anna meets the dermatologist Larry and they become a couple.

programme.title: Think Like a Man
programme.desc: Four women try to maintain their relationships with their men, and come across a solution in the book by the author Steve Harvey, which includes relationship advice. The women implement the strategies presented in the book, which affects their husbands. After the men discover what the women have been doing, they declare war.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: An Austrian teenager marries the Dauphin of France, the future Louis XVI, and she travels to France and rules as a queen following her heirless husband's death. Marie has to face the French people who perceive her as a mere foreigner, and then she has to face the French Revolution.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Two sisters have had an unstable childhood, due to the fact that their mother died and their father remarried. One of the sisters grows up to be an irresponsible rebel and becomes a burden to her family, and finally decides to live with her grandmother to change herself for the better.

programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) is enraged when she discovers her boyfriend (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) is married. She teams up with his wife (Leslie Mann) and another mistress of his (Kate Upton) to plot their revenge.

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: Science teacher Elliot Moore notices the sudden disappearance of bees, and research scientists are unable to pinpoint the reason for this. Eventually, a horrible plague threatens Earth, causing bizarre behavior among the citizens at Central Park.

programme.desc: Claire is a young therapist that works as a grief counselor. Working with a group of plane-crash survivors, she faces a mystery when her clients start to disappear one after another.

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: After a car accident leaves Paige with a severe memory loss, her husband Leo tries to get her to love him again.

programme.title: Dr. Dolittle 2
programme.desc: The adventures of Dr. Dolittle resume as he tries to save a natural habitat inhabited by a female bear, Ava. He gets a circus bear to help out and teaches him how to approach Ava.

programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) is enraged when she discovers her boyfriend (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) is married. She teams up with his wife (Leslie Mann) and another mistress of his (Kate Upton) to plot their revenge.

programme.title: The Counselor
programme.desc: Driven by greed, a successful lawyer finds himself embroiled in a drug plot involving a middle-man known as Westray, as he has to protect himself and his fiancée from a terrible fate.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: An Austrian teenager marries the Dauphin of France, the future Louis XVI, and she travels to France and rules as a queen following her heirless husband's death. Marie has to face the French people who perceive her as a mere foreigner, and then she has to face the French Revolution.
